Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2013 06:56PM Roxie61 wrote: I know what you are going through. I am a mother of 3great kids and a grandmother of 6beautiful grandchildren ranging 2years to 26 years. I was dx with breast ca in 1996. Have been cancer free for 16 and a half years. A month ago I found a lump not far from my other cancer I had. Mamo and ultrasound on Friday biopsy Tuesday. 6days later and I am waiting for results.Only I was told a solid mass like this is usually cancer so here I am visiting my daughter and waiting for results. I don't know how I will get through this again. I have a very loving and caring husband and family.I hope you have a supportive family also.
Posts.Title: The wait is the worst Hla76 alicki
